pullRequest.title: Auto increment primary key in `personalized_user_reports`.
pullRequest.bodyText: I think hibernate will automatically generate this for MySQL tables, but I copied the initial SQL statement from the table it was creating for unit tests, which didn't have it because the in-memory database does not support it.

commit.message:
Auto increment primary key in personalized_user_reports.

I think hibernate will automatically generate this for MySQL tables, but
I copied the initial SQL statement from the table it was creating for
unit tests, which didn't have it because the in-memory database may not
support it.

nodes.bodyText:
I think we also need to update the id in the model to use GenerationType.Identity. Otherwise it will attempt to use the hibernate_sequence table. I think it defaults to GenerationType.Sequence if AUTO is specified.
https://thorben-janssen.com/jpa-generate-primary-keys/
